mapper.select: update INSBRealtimetask set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},tasktype = #{tasktype},tasktypename = #{tasktypename},carlicenseno = #{carlicenseno},insuredid = #{insuredid},insuredname = #{insuredname},insuredcardno = #{insuredcardno},applicantid = #{applicantid},applicantname = #{applicantname},applicantcardno = #{applicantcardno},agentNum = #{agentNum},agentName = #{agentName},deptcode = #{deptcode},deptname = #{deptname},deptinnercode = #{deptinnercode},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},inscomname = #{inscomname},maininstanceid = #{maininstanceid},subinstanceid = #{subinstanceid},operatorname = #{operatorname},taskcreatetime = #{taskcreatetime},datasourcesfrom = #{datasourcesfrom},channelcode = #{channelcode},channelname = #{channelname} where id = #{id}
